jd: Hello, Hope you are doing well My name is Amit Kumar and I'm a Technical Recruiter at Technocraft solutions. We provide IT Consulting Services to our customers immediate and long-term resource needs. I am contacting you either because your resume has been posted to one of the internet job sites to which we subscribe or you had previously submitted your resume to Technocraft solutions. Role: Business Analyst with Commercial Banking Location of work: Stamford, CT. Onsite Duration: 6-12+ months Description: Exposure to Commercial Lending, Cards, Treasury, Payments, Customer Onboarding Ability to formulate and define business requirements & use cases Proficient in functional specs, business process mapping using tools like Visio Exposure to ServiceNow FSO (financial services operations) is preferable. If not ServiceNow then solutions like Pega, Appian, nCINO. Ability to create write artifacts such as reference docs, user guides, etc., in support of the products and solutions Interface with solution and business architects to create requirements documents and templates Experience working with Technical, QA and Business Teams in explaining the requirements and providing functional guidance/answers Knowledge of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC) process, including agile methodologies Excellent oral and written communication skills are required
